dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I sense the presence of an intruder in my domain. What brings you to these cursed lands, mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to vanquish the darkness that plagues this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, mortal. Do you truly believe your pathetic light can stand against the eternal shadow?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My resolve is unyielding, and my purpose unwavering.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Such arrogance in the face of oblivion. Prepare for your futile struggle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will face whatever trials come my way, even if it means confronting the likes of you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You condemn yourself with your own words. Embrace the darkness that awaits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose to turn back and leave this place. This fight is not mine to take.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pitiful coward. You have sealed your fate by abandoning your purpose.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm here to bargain, to find a peaceful solution to this conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace with the shadows? There can be no compromise with the inevitable. Prepare for what must come.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I believe in finding common ground, even in the darkest of times.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your naivety will be your downfall. Embrace the shadows that envelop you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see now that peace is not an option here. I will do what I must to survive.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Survival is a fleeting hope in the face of eternal night. Embrace your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge, to understand the source of this darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is but a fleeting light in the endless night. Prepare to be consumed by the shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will uncover the truth, no matter the cost.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Truth is a fragile illusion in these lands. Embrace the darkness that shrouds all.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps ignorance is bliss. I shall leave this place with my mind unburdened.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignorance is a luxury you cannot afford. Embrace the darkness that beckons.
